text: Amniocentesis is the name of a medical test. It is often performed when screening babies. The test consist of taking a little amniotic fluid and testing it. Fluid which contains tissue of the embryo or fetus allows the specialist doctor (such as radiologist) to determine the sex of the baby. The test is also used to find birth defects. == Related pages == * Pregnancy test * Birth defect * Ultrasound and 3D ultrasound Category:Pregnancy and childbirth Category:Medical tests Category:Obstetrics and gynecology Category:Medical procedures
title: Amniocentesis
